item.description:
We're holding an informal get-together at 7 pm on Saturday, 14 June in Au Bon Pain (251 Massachusetts Ave., in between Symphony Hall and the Hynes Convention Center, both of which have stops on the Green Line). This should be a relaxed and fun opportunity to meet up and chat, maybe get a drink or something to eat, so stop by and bring your friends.

All are welcome, nothing is required. For more information, check out any of
www.spboston.org
www.socialistparty-usa.org
www.vote-socialist.org
www.VoteSocialist2008.org
item.how_to_find_us: Call 248/303-3785 if you don't see us.
item.why: This should be a relaxed and fun opportunity to meet up and chat, maybe get a drink or something to eat, so stop by and bring your friends!
item.name: Socialist Kaffeeklatsch
